TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityTrackingRecord extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Contains the data sent to a tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when an is matched. It is also used in the return list of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it sends an ActivityTrackingRecord to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that tracking service. The tracking service can perform whatever action is needed on the data in the tracking record.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: public ActivityTrackingRecord (Type activityType, string qualifiedName, Guid contextGuid, Guid parentContextGuid, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus executionStatus, DateTime eventDateTime, int eventOrder, EventArgs eventArgs);

The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the activity associated with the activity status event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ActivityType is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the that was matched.
Docs.value: An that contains the annotations that are associated with the that corresponds to this tracking record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

Docs.summary: Gets a list that contains any data extracted from the workflow for the that was matched.
Docs.value: A list of objects each of which contains a single piece of extracted data and its associated annotations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure can extract data from the workflow instance. The data to be extracted is specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can contain two kinds of objects: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the activity associated with the activity status event; and, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the root activity of the workflow. Both of these extract types can also specify annotations to be returned with the extracted data. The runtime tracking infrastructure encapsulates each piece of extracted data and its associated annotations in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>, and adds this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> to Body.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

Docs.value: <xref:System.Guid> that identifies the of the activity associated with the activity status event.

MemberSignature.Value: public override EventArgs EventArgs { get; set; }

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
EventArgs has no meaning for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> and is always a null reference (`Nothing`).
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: public override DateTime EventDateTime { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the date and time that the activity status event occurred.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.DateTime> is Greenwich Mean Time (UTC).
EventDateTime is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int EventOrder { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in the workflow instance of the activity status event that matched the .
Docs.value: A value that indicates the order of the activity status event in the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks EventOrder indicates the relative order of the event that matched the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> within the workflow instance. EventOrder is unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential. EventOrder is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the execution status of the activity associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A workflow instance only emits activity status events when the execution status of an activity instance changes. Therefore an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can only be matched when an activity execution status change occurs. ExecutionStatus contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus?displayProperty=fullName> that triggered the match and caused the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to be sent. It reflects the current status of the activity instance. ExecutionStatus is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

Docs.value: <xref:System.Guid> that identifies the of the activity associated with the activity status event.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the activity associated with this .
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the for which this tracking record was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks QualifiedName is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
